rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you want Parliament to take.

We think you may be concerned about the Equality Act. You might like to know that it is against the law to discriminate against someone because of their lack of religion/belief. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/discrimination-your-rights/types-of-discrimination

There is no Act that criminalises people for not having religious belief.
